value.title: Terraform IOT/ML Infrastructure
value.description: High level goal is to run a seperate lambda function for dev and prod in different regions using terraform workspace separation.

value.title: Visual Tire Inspection
value.description: This is a computer vision application to detect defects in tyres. Build using OpenCV, Django and Deployed using AWS EBS.

value.title: Battle of Time Card Detection
value.description: A Machine Learning pipeline to detect the Doctor Who card (A BBC Show) in a green background video file.

value.title: Notes Application
value.description: A full stack Node application (MERN) for users to take notes and keep track of the activities.

value.title: Text Sentiment Annotator
value.description: A Web application tool to annotate sentiment of the text from the huge CSV file.

value.title: Computational Fluid Dynamic Application
value.description: Computation Fluid Dynamics mini application (karman) which is made faster using Message Passing Interfacing (MPI) in C++.

value.title: Lloyds Banking Group
description: Worked as a Platform Engineer in Machine Learning Platform Lab within the Bank.
Successfully resolved a critical vulnerability in the platform within a day within 24 hour for platform to be 100% FCA complaint by updating user's access level and implement new security groups.
Designed and developed the CI/CD systems using GCP Cloud Build and Jenkins which can scale up to 3000 deployments concurrently with complete security scanning (truffle-hog and aqua scan).
Successfully led a project with a team of 3 members by upgrading (adding MS Team's Channel web-hook) the monitoring/alerting infrastructure in GCP and completed the project 40% ahead of deadline.

value.title: Beakbook
description: Successfully deployed IoT (Internet of Things) AWS workspace to deploy the company's proprietery algorithm using Terraform, AWS Lambda function
Helped hands on to deploy the weighing scale in the farms and the infrastructure can handle 3000 request at once.

value.title: Telescope Analytics
description: Worked as a Machine Learning Engineer.
Successfully deployed 9 tracking event alert alert from frontend (React) and the backend (Python).
Worked on Data Prep for the recommendation systems.

value.title: Z2i Solutions
description: Worked as a Full Stack developer extensively in the backend systems.
Successfully created a optimal data base schema (PostgreSQL) for data storage.

value.title: Qube Cinema Technologies
description: Product Engineer specialized in QA testing.
Deployed 33 test cases in Python using selenium and PyTest framework for the moviebuff product.

value.title: Edge Technologies
description: Computer Vision Engineer role in the automobile industry.
Built (OpenCV and Tensorflow) and Deployed (AWS) 2 computer vision models.
